description: construction of a boathouse, wharf, and workshop
full_summary:
### French River Boathouse, Wharf and Workshop Construction Project

**Reference Number:** WS3620401696-Doc3620479726  
**Solicitation Number:** WS3620401696  
**Tender Closing Date:** October 3, 2022, 14:00 EDT  
**Publication Date:** August 22, 2022  
**Amended Date:** September 27, 2022  
**Amendment Number:** 4  
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal  
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering  
**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)  
**Address:**
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada  
**Occupant:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)  
**Contact:**
Gregoire Morin (gregoire.morin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)  
### Tender Description

This is an amendment to the closing time for the French River Boathouse, Wharf and Workshop Construction Project. The Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and Buyandsell posting closing time are hereby disregarded. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on October 3, 2022, by 14:00 EDT. Any bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

### Tender Details
* Unspsc: 72121400 (Specialized public building construction services)  
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)  
* Procurement Category: CNST  
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price  
* Defense contract File Number: WS3620401696-Doc3620479726  
Notice is hereby given that the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bidders to submit their bids for the construction of the French River Boathouse, Wharf, and Workshop, located in the National Capital Region.
